resources.string: Chaw thau khoom ntaus ntawv cov ntaub ntawv ...
Ua raws li cov lus thov kom tau txais daim ntawv teev tag nrho ntawm txhua yam khoom muaj nqis
Loaded %1$d cov khoom muaj nqis rau hauv cov ntaub ntawv
Tom ntej no, thov teeb tsa koj tus account ...
Yuav tsis tuaj yeem thau cov ntaub ntawv marketcap
Tsis tau mus nrhiav tus account tus account ID
Lub npe tus account muaj rau ntau tshaj 8 cim, muaj tus nab npawb los sis tsis muaj tus cim ntawv. Tsis tau tso cai rau tus menyuam ua cim tau ntxais.
Account lub npe twb muaj nyob
Thov sim dua tom qab 5 feeb
Tshawb xyuas tus tshiab PIN (6+ tus lej)
Tus kais dej rov qab ua yuam kev. Msg: %1$s
Yuam kev nyeem ntawv cov ntaub ntawv
Tus app tsis txeeb tau cov ntaub ntawv hais txog tus account tshiab khiv tawm
Thov tos thaum koj tus account tau tsim

Tus neeg rau zaub mov rov qab ua yuam kev. Qhov no tej zaum yuav yog vim muaj kev txwv tsis pub muaj teeb meem rau kev tso cai rau kev tso cai tuaj yeem tawm los ntawm qhov chaw tus IP nyob hauv ib lub sij hawm luv luv. Thov tos 5 feeb thiab rov sim dua, lossis hloov mus rau lwm lub network, Piv txwv li ntawm wifi mus rau tes.
Thov nco ntsoov koj backup koj brainkey ua ntej txoj kev pib. Qhov no yuav cia koj rov qab tau koj tus account thaum muaj ib yam dab tsi tshwm sim rau hauv lub tshuab ntaus ntawv no.
Koj yuav nyiam import koj tus account uas twb muaj lawm li cas?
Thov nkag mus rau qhov kev lees paub ntawm koj tus nab npawb PIN
Thov nkag mus rau lub hlwb
Thov nkag rau lub hlwb, nws yuav tsum muaj ntawm 12 thiab 16 lo lus.
Account twb nyob ua ib ke
Cov yuam sij muab los ntawm qhov kev xav hauv lub hlwb no zoo li siv los tswj ntau tshaj ib tus as khauj, thov xaiv tus account uas koj xav import
Tsis muaj kev sib txuas hauv Internet
Tam sim no .bin cov ntaub ntawv Password lossis PIN
Thov nco ntsoov tias koj tus pin muaj tseeb los yog cov ntaub ntawv hauv cov tsev kawm ntawv raug xaiv
Thov sau tus password siv los encrypt cov ntaub ntawv no backup
Thov sau tus naj npawb tus xov tooj siv los encode cov ntaub ntawv no
Tus lej naj npawb yuav tsum muaj tsawg kawg yog 6 tug lej
Tsis siv tus account siv qhov tseem ceeb no, thov kom koj siv cov ntaub ntawv kho tshiab tshiab.
Tsis muaj lub hnab thaub ntim rov qab muaj nyob hauv cov ntaub ntawv no
Invalid tus account, thov saib koj lub hlwb tseem ceeb rau kev sau tsis raug
Xaiv cov khoom muaj nqis los txais.
Koj yuav tsum teeb tsa tus nqi qiv nyiaj hauv Bitshares thiaj li yuav tau txais cov nyiaj them tuaj. Los sis yog tias koj twb muaj ib qho, koj tuaj yeem xa nws tuaj rau ntawm no.
Xaiv koj qhov kev xav tau Smartcoin:
Tseem ceeb kev ua yuam kev yuam kev

Lub yog tsis tuaj yeem rov qab tau koj cov password private ntawm tus database. Vim li no koj yuav tsum nkag mus rau koj cov yuam sij dua. Yog nyob rau hauv daim ntawv ntawm lub hlwb los yog daim ntawv rau hauv cov ntaub ntawv thaub qab database uas tau generated thiab muab cia rau hauv koj tus sdcard yog tias tus account tau tsim los ntawm lub
Cov Nyiaj Them Rov Qab / Rov Qab
Hais yuam kev hauv phau ntawv
Nws tsis muaj kev txiav txim hauv DEX uas yuav pab peb ua tus pauv mus rau %1$s thaum lub sij hawm ntawd. \n \n__Ua mus rau qhov kev tshuaj ntsuam thiab xaiv ib qho khoom muaj nqis sib txawv.
Tsis muaj kev mus cuag tau
Xaiv cov nyiaj them poob haujlwm

Ib qho nyiaj them poob haujlwm tau raug kuaj tau, tab sis tsis tuaj yeem yuav raug xa mus rau cov nyiaj them poob haujlwm yav dhau los. Thov xaiv qhov kev thov kom them nyiaj los ntawm cov npe nram qab no.
Qhov no yuav txuas mus rau cov nyiaj them poob haujlwm mus rau qhov kev thov dhau los ntawm %1$s
Cov ntaub ntawv them nuj nqi them tuaj
Thov nco ntsoov tias qhov kev txiav txim no tsis tuaj yeem ua tsis tau
Lub txiaj ntsim no yuav raug xaiv raws koj hom lus thiab xaiv lub teb chaws. Yog tias koj xav hloov cov neeg no, koj yuav tsum mus rau lub ntiaj teb chaw ntawm koj ntaus ntawv.

PalmPay Ambassadors tau them txhua 3 vib nas this. Lawv txoj hauj lwm yog los txhawb cov tub lag luam PalmPay hauv zos thiab txhim kho txhua hli Kev Sib Ntsib Kev Sib Ntsib. Yog tias koj lub nroog tsis tau teev, ces koj lub nroog tseem tsis tau muaj tus Poj Niam Xam Xaj. 
 
 Rau cov lus qhia ntxiv, mus saib hauv lub zej zog Agorise hauv Telegram: 
 http://t.me/Agorise
Luam rau ntawv los teev cia
Rau hauv cov ntaub ntawv. Nco ntsoov txuag koj thaub qab thaub qab mus rau ib daim npav MicroSD lossis USB Stick.
Brainkey. Txhab nyiaj rov qab lo lus uas yuav ntes tau los sis theej, tab sis tsis kho.
Sau qhov no, lossis sau nws. Txhua tus neeg uas nkag tau rau hauv koj lub lag luam rov qab yuav nkag tau rau cov nyiaj hauv cov khoom no.
Lo lus zais kev lees paub
Yuav tsum sau ib lo lus zais
Lo lus zais thiab kev lees paub kev siv mismatch
Txawj tej yam ntxiv rau LTM
"Hloov mus rau LifeTime Kev Ua Haujlwm (LTM)." LTM accounts them ze tshaj xoom cov nqi, tau 80% nyiaj ntsuab thiab nyiaj pub rau cov kev xa mus. "

Lub Neej Ua Haujlwm Lub Neej (Life Time) tso cai rau koj mus pauv nrog cov nqi ntawm cov nqi zog network. 
 
Kuv yuav siv mus rau tus account tam sim no "%1$s" 
 
Yog li cas los xij nrog tus nqi ntawm 100 USD them hauv Bitshares. 
 
Kev puas yog koj xav tias koj xav mus ntxiv?
Kev lag luam uas muaj koj qhov kev thov yog raug ua los ntawm lub network
Kev ua yuam kev thaum sim ntsig txog kev txheeb xyuas nyiaj
Thov nco ntsoov tias koj tus account muaj nyiaj seem txaus kom them rau cov nqi
Pab kev zoo siab! koj tus account tau tam sim no tau kho kom zoo dua rau lub neej Kev Koom Tes.
Tshem qhov Merchant Account no. Tshem cov Merchant Account saum toj no los ntawm qhov ntaus ntawv no thiab tsim los yog nqus ib qho txawv.
"Koj puas paub tseeb tias koj xav tawm tus as khauj \'%1$s\' ntawm lub hnab no?"
Issue Loyalty ntsiab lus raws li ...
Koj tus as khauj tseem tsis tau muaj tus kheej %1$s. Thov tau ib co ua ntej koj sim muab tej yam rau koj cov neeg muas zaub li Loyalty Cov Ntsiab Lus.
Thov xaiv tsis pub ntau tshaj 8 khoom muaj nqis
Lub Bitshares (BTS) tub ntxhais token yog yuav tsum tau ua.
Cov khoom lag luam qes me ntsis yog cov neeg tsis taus lub cev. Lawv yuav tsum tau qhib thaum lub khw ntim nce mus rau ntau npaum li cas
Tsis tau tsim cov hom ntawv rau qhov tseem ceeb
Txuag Rau Hauv Cov Ntaub Ntawv Rau: %1$s
Rau hauv cov ntaub ntawv rua kev txhawm rau: %1$s
Tsim cov ntaub ntawv thaub qab
PDF tsim thiab tau txais kev cawmdim: %1$s
Tsis tau tsim pdf. Thov rov ua dua. Yuam kev: %1$s
CSV generated thiab tau txais kev cawmdim: %1$s
Tsis tau tsim csv. Thov rov ua dua. Yuam kev: %1$s
Cov khoom lag luam xa tawm
Thov ntaus tus nab npawb PIN
Thov sau koj tus lej PIN naj npawb
Tus naj npawb PIN tam sim no
Thov nkag tus nab npawb PIN qub
Node kev twb kev txuas yuam kev, retrying
Peb tau txais ib qho khoom them tuaj, tab sis tsis muaj qhov thov tuaj yeem nrhiav tau
